description.p: Infamous plugins contain the following LV2 plugins:

ul.li: Cellular Automaton Synth: synthesizer plugin is an additive synthesizer, where 16 harmonics are added according to rules of elementary cellular automata.
Envelope Follower: a fully featured envelope follower plugin.
Hip2B: a distortion/destroyer plugin, inspired by effect pedals by dwarfcraft.
stuck: a clone of the electro-harmonix freeze.
power up: the opposite of the power cut. It "winds up" rather than down, or goes from silence when off, to slowly speeding up to full speed in the amount of time set by the control.
lushlife: a simulated double tracking plugin capable of everything from a thin beatle effect to thick lush choruses to weird outlandish effects.
mindi: a mini MIDI message maker.
bent delay: a lo-fi delay subtracting a downsampled (aliased) delayed signal from the original.
